metadata.synopsis: A hostage escapes. She had trapped herself in a storage room trying to find something to help her escape.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Press the lever (S_IRN_PrisonerGroup7_Lever_4192a7e4-7f33-4ffd-9f86-b5aac73c2a6b)  to release the hostage from the locked room adn the AD will play automatically.

0.speaker: Caralee Grollo
0.text: Th-thank you... I thought I was done for...
0.context: NodeContext: pained whisper, she's just been tortured
